channel.title: My interview on the "Speaking of Products" podcast
channel.description:
Here's [a podcast interview where I get to be the guest instead of the host](https://www.speakingofproducts.com/episodes/steve-mcleod).
Dan Miller and I talked about the basics of SEO for small software products.
I was able to drop in the irrelevant but slightly interesting fact that New Zealand (where I was born) and Spain (where I live) have cities that are [true antipodes](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Antipodes#Cities).
